title: Eli and the Thirteenth Confession
content:
This 1968 lettering (which originally appeared on the lyric-sheet insert, a roughly textured stock) strikes me, in its unpolished ﬁnish, as being very now.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419002417im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Eli_3751.jpg)
author: Nick Shinn

comments.content: Man, that's memory lane for me!
